languages.text: {n}Священник окидывает вас испытующим взглядом, и тон его чуть смягчяется.{/n} "Что же, тогда храни ее с удвоенным тщанием. Ибо этот сектор только и ждет, чтобы попробовать ее на прочность".

traits.locale_text: {n}Окинув вас испытующим взглядом, священник чуть теплеет.{/n} "Что же, тогда храни ее с удвоенным тщанием. Ибо этот сектор только и ждет, чтобы попробовать ее на прочность".

languages.text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."
languages.original_text: {n}Священник окидывает вас испытующим взглядом, и тон его чуть смягчяется.{/n} "Что же, тогда храни ее с удвоенным тщанием. Ибо этот сектор только и ждет, чтобы попробовать ее на прочность".

traits.locale_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinizing look, then his expression softens.{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."
{n}He gives you a scrutinizing look, then his expression softens.{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."
{n}He gives you a scrutinizing look, then his expression softens.{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."
{n}He gives you a scrutinizing look, then his expression softens.{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."
{n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."
{n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."

languages.text: {n}他审视地看着你，之后语气变得柔和起来。{/n}“既然如此，那就加倍努力吧，因为这片星域不会放过任何机会来考验你的信仰。”
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}他审视地看着你，之后语气变得柔和起来。{/n}“既然如此，那就加倍努力吧，因为这片星域不会放过任何机会来考验你的信仰。”

languages.text: {n}Te analiza con la mirada y después suaviza el tono:{/n} «Bueno, entonces deberá ser el doble de diligente. En este sector, su fe estará a prueba en todo momento».
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te analiza con la mirada y después suaviza el tono:{/n} «Bueno, entonces deberá ser el doble de diligente. En este sector, su fe estará a prueba en todo momento».

languages.text: {n}彼はこちらを精査するような目で見た後、口調を和らげた。{/n}「それならば、倍の勤勉さをお見せください。この星域はあらゆる面であなたの信念を試すでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はこちらを精査するような目で見た後、口調を和らげた。{/n}「それならば、倍の勤勉さをお見せください。この星域はあらゆる面であなたの信念を試すでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Er wirft dir einen prüfenden Blick zu, dann wird sein Ton sanfter:{/n} "Nun, dann seid doppelt so gewissenhaft. Denn dieser Sektor wird jede Chance nutzen, um Euren Glauben auf die Probe zu stellen."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er wirft dir einen prüfenden Blick zu, dann wird sein Ton sanfter:{/n} "Nun, dann seid doppelt so gewissenhaft. Denn dieser Sektor wird jede Chance nutzen, um Euren Glauben auf die Probe zu stellen."

languages.text: {n}Il vous dévisage un moment, puis son ton s'adoucit :{/n} « Eh bien dans ce cas, faites preuve de deux fois plus de diligence. Car ce secteur fera tout pour mettre votre foi à l'épreuve. »
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous dévisage un moment, puis son ton s'adoucit :{/n} « Eh bien dans ce cas, faites preuve de deux fois plus de diligence. Car ce secteur fera tout pour mettre votre foi à l'épreuve. »

languages.text: {n}Sana irdeleyici bir bakış atıyor, ardından ses tonu yumuşuyor.{/n} "O hâlde iki kat temkinli ol. Bu sektör, inancını sınamak için hiçbir fırsatı tepmez."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then his tone softens:{/n} "Well, then be twice as diligent. For this sector will seize any chance to test your faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana irdeleyici bir bakış atıyor, ardından ses tonu yumuşuyor:{/n} "O hâlde iki kat temkinli ol. Bu sektör inancını sınamak için hiçbir şansı geri tepmez."
